body: I was wondering, What is the average wait time for a ban appeal response? I Have been banned and I appealed. I sent the appeal over 12 hours ago and havn't heard any word. I didn't break any rules and would like to continue playing. Anyone out there get their appeal accepted? If so how long did it take?
body_tagged: I was wondering, What is the average wait time for a ban appeal response? I Have been banned and I appealed. I sent the appeal over 12 hours ago and havn't heard any word. I didn't break any rules and would like to continue playing. Anyone out there get their appeal accepted? If so how long did it take?
title: E-mail Response

replies.body:
like a day or 2.

not the end of the world here
replies.body_tagged:
like a day or 2.

not the end of the world here

replies.body:
It takes years.
Dont mind Mooch, he's an asshole. <3

replies.body: It may take a few weeks, but if you do not get a response within 1 week, re-send an e-mail.
replies.body_tagged: It may take a few weeks, but if you do not get a response within 1 week, re-send an e-mail.

replies.body: It usually takes 17 years, but times change.
replies.body_tagged: It usually takes 17 years, but times change.

replies.body:
It takes at least a lifetime.

But in all seriousness, about 1-2 days.
At the worst? A few weeks.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I sent like 7

So I'd just use skype, I never got responses from email.
